title: Computer freezes right as I start a game
body: I have a lenovo thinkpad t540 and I recently upgraded from windows 7 to windows 10 education. Now when i load league of legends, i can log in, find a match, go to champion select but a second after the actual in-game loads, my laptop freezes and I need to force reboot. I have tried repairing, uninstalling and reinstalling, nothing works.

replies.body:
This is probably caused by the *Game DVR* feature inside the Windows Game Bar. I suggest working through [these steps](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) in order to disable the feature.

Let me know if that step resolved this issue.
